Acknowledgements

This site was published with GitHub Pages, using an in-house Jekyll theme called forsyde-web-theme. The visual profile is closely following the Slate Theme, but much of the code has also been inspired and imported from the Jekyll Bootstrap Doc and the Jekyll Documentation Theme projects.

Some icons are embedded using Font Awesome and Academicons fonts.
